twitch_info.title: Crimson Needle 2.5 | #7 - Crawling to the Top (Blind Playthrough)

message.body: have you ruminated on past lessons, such as the ones from floor 12?
alright alright, unless called upon I have no intention to backseat
let's say it like it is, you were blinded by a fit of rage
"I wouldn't say rage, it was more like wrath"
wait hold on one second did you just say that screen was easy?
or did you mean that SAVE was easy...
yeah no that was the hardest for me when i got there too
doesn't look too bad but damn it's long
fair, you have to put blood on every spike on the screen
just a tribute to the needle gods
I did not realize you returned...
she's not very far in to be fair lol
there are so many potential days
im afraid the likelihood of me converting is rather miniscule
it cannot be 0 with that ult...
yeah this game feels like noticably harder than CN2 to me
kinda weird since it's literally just a port
if you change your align you might get a couple more pixels
I feel as though first trying all of 95 may happen
your mind went to a dark place
this is where we differ perhaps
the good kind of dark place... washington
best of luck with your blind endeavors
alright but here's the thing wolfi
okay wait imagine a 100F game where you have to play it that way to unlock more floors
I'm very curious what game that is now
that was supposed to be a :)
wait all these people here right now... perhaps it's time for some buildies?
I do not joke about buildies...
worst case scenario we could play on an older version of minecraft
he did, it was an incredible stream
im just sad we didnt get a anuj 2.5 stream
we'd need to see anuj 2 and 3 first
if anuj streams vandal he wins speedrunner of the year
if nader streams CN2.5 I will let my mom know
one more... for the good guys...
the day i stream 2.5 will be legendary (one in a million)
cn2.5 got submitted to fasf this year bro, who knows
I bet you could make it with a bunnyhop
cn2.5 any% was submitted but not accepted from what I heard
lmao i got no clue, homie submitted it before the release
it was submitted before the game was out
it's not the first time someone submitted a game to FASF before it was released lol
I think it happened with wannafest or some other blind game
my assumption is cosmo will come to use but yeah I'll drop a message in the group chat lol
"gonna start working on this again next week, anyone got ideas for a name? I haven't put too much thought into it yet"
it appears he posted that yesterday lol
yeye dev channel. just opened it to check
im literally off the edge of my seat in anticipation
im almost falling off my chair
I feel as though this request does not match my desires
I didn't know they had chairs in brazil
i reminisce on the days of wolfiexe at floor 93 of cn2.5
the economy was good, gas prices were still under 2 dollars... those were the days
kids nowadays will never get it
every single floor in the 90s cooked my goose
its a tough game but you shall Overcome
pluto is this the first time u catch a wolfie stream lmao
yeah lol it is because when i joined the community he was very retired
but we're back in the golden era now, so wolfie will stream every day
I assume you got a job?
If you do this, Keir said he would put Freddo's to 10p again.
those streams started a lot of maker trends and sagas
maybe thats what this game is missing
the stupid idiot spike... the cinematic bicycle universe...
The 9-5 is killing me for the past 8 years ngl.
alright but think about it, part-time amq streamer?
Well, im the CTO/Senior so im pretty jam packed
There's always something to do lol
amq is a category on twitch
and tbh u can disable those technically
People play OST from games and they're ok.
if it's gambling, stream it on kick insteaf
UMG come knocking at your door faster than the TV license man.
this guy just said insteaf LUL
its no surprise kale doesn't care about being dmca friendly
Freddo's are 10p now. Keir approved it.
seems real hard but real fun
the section in the middle looks like the terribly polluted bay an hour away from my town
wolfi isn't this like one of the multitwist screens
OHHHH wait, i think i actually see this
well it was one of the smaller ones
yea i think the last one was in 2021 with fm
That jump refresher must be on a grant quest to save the princess
it's the most talked about arrow on screen for sure
im not sure the game is possible anymore with that massive bug...
Speaking of the beast, have you heard about the controversy?
What's up Alex? Hope the game dev is going well
Ehh it's going, spend most of the time with relatives today
Same. Prepping to go to a baseball game tonight
Just to show you that arrows will be coming in that column maybe
Composure gathered. Now it is time for progress
My neighbor's cat is cheering you on Wolfie https://photos.app.goo.gl/TDHeP9We2whqwfoa7
is this you right now https://i.imgflip.com/wlv08.jpg?a478176
theres something about "cute as buttons" that really tickled me
is this different to the og CN2?
nah not much changed from this to cn2, its just ported to studio
i think all he changed was removing some saves
the water is worse now too right?
hmm some saves did feel a tad harder
you can but we're fixing it
your cameo was the old wise man
just a bug crawling on your monitor..
Ziggy7Z subscribed at Tier 1. They've subscribed for 50 months! wolfieAbort I dunno how long you're gonna be back fren, but I had to press this button.
Hope life is at least adequate
doing well, got a good new job, fully transitionned as an old RPG speedrunner
Yeah, it's the main tournament going on at the moment, I'm doing good, 3-1 so far in the group stage
The whole community is friend shaped.
alright just caught up on you playing the piece content
cant believe he put a whole adventure game. I did get a little upset over the bees but the stage as a whole waas great
finding the first goblin kid is difficult for everyone I feel like
God that emote is still my magnum opus
This floor is too hard, the maker should apologize.
I mean you go into a CN game expecting hardship not apologies
I've seen little of this, only mostly geezer playing
We know the world is terrible because cookies are not a renewable ressource
You can have my leftover cookie HolidayCookie
for not having played hard fangames for so long you're slaying this game
Can't believe they ditched the BlessRNG emote
bracing for a complex multi-step jump, getting ready just to die immediately is the quintessential fangame experience
bits and pieces. I played CN2 multiple times but its still hard to remember every jump
layoutgs and tilesets and music were noticeable yeah
oh yeah the diag is gone
also last jump used to be quite dubious
it was a diagonal gat diagonal
oh right I had a dream that I bought twitch bits because the enabled me to temporarily fly like piece's gargoyle. wild stuff
it says 99 in the top left
naaah, you're having a mandela moment Wolfie
Bummer is doxing you as we speak
you never know what people are capable of...
why does it say blue on death?
im gonna do it today. all the rest in 1 stream
I remember when the first DT3 speedrun was 27 hours (60+ casually), and now the record is just under 7
ok that one is more unlikely to even happen
Blue was a good ol' dog
i thought maybe reference to the player
i think id need to do 3 of those gate jump streams to finish this game
wolsk how did cn3 stream go yesterday
you seemed to get to green a lot
i definitely did not get to green a lot lol. i reached it a few times very quickly and then couldnt get back. never reached blue either
that would be a good save to label "WUSS"
it was like 10 gates or something
yeah you said how orange was hardest for you. I felt the same way before I got to blue a bunch
blue seems tough but orange owns me
floor 100 is actually a single gate so i think you can finish today
its just platforming so you can first try and clear
gates arent known for being easy
well hold on there buddy. gates are almost frame perfect after all. so I get that some people may struggle with it and call 100 "hard"
he was only using 0.2% of his potential
it's okay echo you got like 75% of that message correct
you know what really annoys me. the 3 spikes on topleft that touch
it id visually displeasing I agree
if theyre individuals then why are they together
they individually chose to group up
You should write a documentary about those 3 spikes Wolfie
that jump seems a bit tricky
see how much you have relied
shift cancels are very keyboard dependent
I think a lower poll rate might make it easier or something, idk
there's a new razer that supposedly counter strafes for you. I bet you can easily jump cancel with that model
I used numpad cancels for the double diamond secret in cn3
it's just useful sometimes but I wouldnt rely on it
it's like one of those kickstarter games where it scrolls random usernames for an hour
and the names are all so small you cant even read them
I havent played too many games with credits like that
The only ones that come to mind are final fantasy (ARR credits), pizza tower (which the backer section is fairly short) and bloodstained
bloodstained is a good meme because the credits are like 90 minutes long and there's an achievement for fully watching them
sea of stars was forever credits as well
I think mighty no 9 had 4 hours of credits if you didnt skip the backer section
tbf sea of stars isnt very long
Bro I was about to pog because we were talking about Chain of Memories.
You can't do me like that...
birth by sleep is worth playing
CoM is the only one of the spinoffs that I liked.
yeah 3 was only on PS4 for a while
Well, ya know, "spinoffs", non numbered games.
yeah KH2 without chain of memories is rough
Or in the case of 358/2 Days, extremely numbered.
the story makes absolutely no sense in general
kingdom hearts 3 is gonna be my last one. it makes no sense
@Mrzwanzig birth by sleep is not numbered but imo that game is not a spinoff
none of them are really spinoffs since they're all part of the main plot
it couldve been good but it was like the writer had one too many shroom when he wrote it
to be fair, you've played all of Trails...
pretty much only one game does next to nothing (coded is fun though)
yeah literally everything is part of the main plot, including the mobile games and the rhythm game
there's probably a 17h youtube video explaining all of it
Yes but we don't talk about KH2 Atlantica.
birth by sleep has a rhythm minigame too
the ice cream in disney town
uh ziggy when you open up kh3 it LITERALLY has an option to watch back the plot
And IT STILL DOESNT MAKE SENSE
That WAS the whole world, that and a rushed but also too long for the game it's in retelling of the Little Mermaid.
Yeah I never played any of the KH games
I thought they learned their lesson with Chrono Cross but i guess not
At least trails doesn't have plot-relevant mobile spinoffs
trails is also like a dozen 30-40+ hour RPGs lol
Around the mid 2010's they started to realize how out of hand and impossible to keep up with the series had gotten because of all of the handheld games with crucial plot on different consoles.
and KH usually peaks around 25 for main story
So they started putting everything on PS3/4 and including glossaries for those who couldn't be bothered.
trails right, not the tales of series
tales games are also long lol
yeah Tales is all standalone except the couple that aren't
actually that reminds me of the earlier discussion, kh3 does the "put player usernames in the game" thing
tales of series is so awful
theres a part where it throws out a list of users who played the mobile game
Arise main game is fine, but I rated the DLC pretty low
i played arise as the fiest tales game. it was mediocre and then i heard it was the best in the series
though I still think Arise is one of the worst overall
and they dont port anything and it's unfortunate
people usually say Abyss, Symphonia, Vesperia, and Berseria are the best
i need to try the destiny ps2 translation tbh
personally I really like both Xillia games
sadly Bandai Namco is really bad about porting them
the 3ds version is surprisingly good for how early it was
most of the series is unplayable on current consoles/PC
Wolfie, you should add an abyss emote
though it was physical only lol
being a digimon fan in the early 2010s üòî
they haven't even announced a new Tales game despite Arise selling incredibly well üòî
I didn't like arise that much :/
there is a xillia remaster rumor, but for some reason only xillia 1
yeah the DLC was last year
which was like 3 years after the original game, for some reason
dev cycles are just huge nowadays
Man, I almost choked on water earlier because of ski jumping.
arise is a lot of empty and repetitive stuff. the story is not bad but not amazing
your first words were "I want to reach floor 100 in crimson needle 2.5"
every boss having hyper armour and dps checks was pain also
I don't even hear the song.
uhhh let me check someone else's vod lol
the final dungeon is truly awful, it's incredible
it's really boring corridors, then halfway through you just go through the same design but backwards
they should return to the real peak tales game, keroro rpg
I was playing on hard at the time and it took like 10 hours or something, I was going insane
Alright, best RPG final dungeon, go.
kefka's tower is pretty up there also
It's a shame they made every other dungeon just TERRIBLE to balance it out, but it's so peak.
ff6 is kinda cool. for its time it was ground breaking
I would say call of house hardabar
depending on how you stretch the definition I think PI in xenoblade 1 is pretty damn cool
All I remember about that is the K2 music. LUL
zestiria final dungeon was also pretty good
Mostly because I only know it from your streams.
I'm nostalgic for both Golden Sun final dungeons, but I don't remember specifics
Prison Island In Xenoblade 1 is pretty phenomenal
I do have a soft spot for The World That Never Was from KH2 also.
Xenoblade is fun, I don't remember the final dungeon tho
They're all very good games, but I'd downgrade Xenosaga 2 to decent.
I also don't think golden sun was very memorable either
also again maybe stretching it but if you allow the entire tree from xc2 then that's quite cool
FF9's final dungeon is very neat visually but has been ruined for me by speedruns. :P
I've simply seen too many broken hearts.
@MLSTRM Well it is the final dungeon, but also the final 3 chapters, so LUL
the last act of fire emblem echoes is up there for me
I'd say the 1st epic one was Chrysler Tower in Parasite Eve
I'm shocked Parasite Eve never got a remaster
the tower is like half the game lol
get this man more cookies, he's running out of mojo

I was trying to think about the final dungeon question, I realized it's really hard to make a good final dungeon because at that point you don't really care about a lot of the mechanical progression. I guess trails SC?
sky SC definitely has a cool one
FC has the better music though
what about best final boss fight?
azure is good storywise but it drags a little, SC is long but feels like there
some bosses and the entire sequence are just captivating
I thought it was a big wow moment when the fight kicks off and it shows you how you're gonna fight
Like oh wow they're really doing this
tears of the kingdom has a great final boss
The healthbar is a great touch
Tears of the Kingdom is phenomenal
play Wand of Gamelon on stream, all cutscenes.
"..." most epic line of all time
Yeah gen 2 is easily the worst, at leas out of what I've played (up to 6).
I love many things about gen 2 but its gameplay and how good the pokemon are is a notable bump in quality :(
im done with the entire pokemon series. when they make a new game that isnt another rehash of the other games then maaaaybe
sucks one of my favorite pokemon is ledian, which is infamously bad
Original GSC has like...maybe 15 usable pokemon for a playthrough and a completely fucked level curve that completely gives up in Kanto.
also fucked up like 5 lines are stuck to postgame
slugma, misdrevous, houndour, and more lol
But then, I also like Colosseum which you can level the same complaints at to some degree so maybe I'm a hypocrite. LUL
i mean when i was younger I loved the johto games, and still kinda do
tbh my favorite are gen 7 with alola, a lot of my favorite pokemon and many changes for the better with gameplay
Also gen 2 introduced time based mechanics which were the source of so much time wasting bullshit over the next few games, so I blame it for that. OpieOP
Gamewinners used to be my go to site as well lol.
There definitely was a lot of shenanigans on there. LUL
that's literally a binding of isaac item lol
I believed in my own fake rumors for the next generation lol
I love when games do that
I mostly credit Gamewinners with the fact that they had links to GameFAQs, which how I discovered that vastly superior site. OpieOP
there's actually something on the border of some old pokemon rumors for catching a former event legendary in scarlet and violet's dlc
I mean, considering how utterly buggy the GB pokemon games were, it,s not impossible that team created a memory leak that sent you to a dev room. But we'd know about it now.
I went through a phase at some point of reading guides not because I needed the help, but just because I enjoyed them for their own sake.

@Ixiot_ You have to go to a specific area where the music lowers, spin in place for 10 seconds, after doing that you pull up your phone and turn to the sepia filter, and you eventually see the pokemon
this is something they actually did
hello wolfi, did you figure out floor 30?
wasnt there a stupid one to get a mew in og pokemon?
you can get two mews easily via glitches which is funny
i assume its where the orange ends
where did you get up to past the cross?
the one with the green cherry i found really hard for some reason
its the hardest one in the save for me for some reason
it feels like it should be easy but i kept dying
i had to pull the plug due to the time...
luckily i was a little earlier in the day
Turns out, this save was the best rpg final dungeon all along
The addition of the cross makes it better than the CN3 version imo
i think i actually like it more than cn3's
The great thing about this save is that the jumps are readable just enough
you know some of the rooms are a lot easier to see when you arent full white glow outline kid
background changing color as you progress is so good
that would be a horrible discovery to realise your pb is at the orange territory
time flies when you're having fun :)
nobody is stopping you from playing this and having toast
alright, I might have reached my limit for today. hf gl Wolfie FoxWave
on the other hand, eating crimson needles would be less fun than playing toast
the water circles were such a huge initial shock, crazy how consostent they are tho
I'm back, you can now easily clear moleYo
water sticks out of the border. so its where the brown ends
oh that brown also counts, I think it just overlaps with the following background
yeah just look at the stationary brown. thats the end of the water
wasnt expecting you to be here so soon
are gameplay suggestions allowed or is that deemed backseating and bad
i did have the same thought but i didnt wanna say just incase it would be bad
I was gonna say purple blocks purple background
like the one on the screen transition thats confused you
also when echo said it also yes i agree on that one too
no no like the transition, the edge thing that confused you
ok nvm you just did what i was gonna suggest anyway
as long as wolfie is hugging a wall he is happy
I've heard of a fellow who got to the wallhug tutorial, said "ohh I get it" grabbed a random align and ignored the wallhugs
would have raided you but i wasn't sure how it works with showing the stream. seems like you're on this floor though so it doesn't matter
yea i went pretty long too, addicting game
i imagine you're pretty far in then
yea i hate dying to those drops
the cross has a will of it's own, it just wants to leave
i find the first parts of the cross rly hard
alright fuck it, we'll get em another day
i was never consistent at the blue brick one and the one after
just imagine this is construction and kale said if we fall one more time he's done forever
down for the count that is
1 round of know what i meme
you sound like you would pass out if you took your hands off the keyboard for 30 seconds
solgryn why'd you be so mean...
how close is it to 3 hours
i think doing the first 99 floors is maybe harder
one more attempt for the good guys
that is a hard segment imo
you do still have it though
couple deeeep ones in a row there
you'll show him when he wakes up
kale is probably the most sleep deprived out of all of us
sleep will make you a god tomorrow, after processing todays massive workout you grow new wings
you would never let me down
was watching that like a world cup final
witnessed right before i go to bed moleGasm
Shame you don't have the cross for 101 tho Kappa
damn I was tabbed away, gg
the posture is perfect on the edge of my seat
looked a bit shaky at one point but i believed most of the time
you kept yourself together on that one death
i would have died there again for sure
I mean you had a period of despair before the clear too Geezer
Seems built in with this save
geezer needed overwatch to clear it
yeah dont spoil the overwatch stage bro
Now you can explore the thing
It is indeed the guy from King's Bounty
